title: Magic The Gathering Is SCAMMING You 💀 #mtg #secretlair #shorts
description: Wizards of the Coast just dropped identical Secret Lair products at different price points. No explanation. The community is NOT happy.

title: NASA Is About To Make History 🌙 #nasa #artemis #shorts
description: NASA's Artemis II could launch as early as February 8th — putting humans around the Moon for the first time since Apollo.

title: Ashes of Creation Studio SHUT DOWN Weeks After Launch 💀 #gaming #mmo #shorts
description: Ashes of Creation raised $3.27M on Kickstarter, spent years in development, launched Early Access in December — and now Intrepid Studios has shut down. The director resigned over ethical disagreements with the board. RIP.

title: Anthropic Just DESTROYED ChatGPT With This Super Bowl Ad 🚫 #ai #claude #shorts
description: Anthropic announced Claude will remain ad-free — then dropped a Super Bowl commercial dunking on ChatGPT for adding ads. The AI wars just got personal.

title: Russian Hackers Exploited This Microsoft Patch in 48 HOURS 💀 #cybersecurity #shorts
description: Fancy Bear reverse-engineered Microsoft's emergency Office patch and built an advanced exploit in under 48 hours. They hit defense ministries and diplomatic organizations across 9 countries.

title: Valve Just Delayed the Steam Machine and It's AI's Fault 🎮 #gaming #valve #shorts
description: RAM prices have tripled as memory makers prioritize AI servers. Valve can't price the Steam Machine, Steam Frame, or Steam Controller competitively anymore.

title: GitHub Just Added Claude and Codex as Coding Agents 🤖 #github #ai #shorts
description: You can now run Claude by Anthropic and OpenAI Codex directly inside GitHub. Assign different AI agents to different tasks, compare solutions side by side.
